name: Blasty: Tower Defense
description:
Blocky: Tower Defense, but with full Pixel graphics, epic music, and new towers. 

Click to place towers. Hover over select buttons for stats. Defend against powerful enemies. Enemies range from buggies and jeeps to fully armored tanks! Towers are interesting turrets!

Features:

  • Interesting pixel graphics
  • Music loop
  • 4 towers
  • 4 enemies
  • Fun strategic gameplay

For a demo, download Blocky: Tower Defense (link above)
